text: Rixey may refer to: ==People== * Eppa Rixey (1891-1963), Major League Baseball pitcher * George F. Rixey (1888–1974), first Deputy Chief of Chaplains of the United States Army * John Franklin Rixey (1854-1907), American politician * Presley Marion Rixey (1852-1928), US Navy Rear Admiral, Surgeon General of the United States Navy, and presidential physician ==Other uses== * USS Rixey (APH-3), a casualty evacuation transport ship in the US Navy * Rixey, Virginia, United States
title: Rixey
